Text: Re Methane AutoStan I have not received any response from Lou Pai Is he still with Enron I did not get a return receipt from the emails I have sent to him Do you have anyone else that may be interested in looking at this potential gas fueled auto technology that these entrepreneurs have The reason why I contact you again on this is that the folks that wish to submit the unsolicited proposal to Enron called me again asking if we are interested Sorry to bother you with this again but if there is anyone else I can contact I would appreciate it Regards Henry Forwarded by Henry VanENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM Henry Van AM To Stanley NRON cc Subject Re Methane Auto Stan Thank you I will contact Lou Henry Stanley NRON AM To Henry VanENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re Methane Auto Contact Lou Pai He is heading up our new Xelerator program that is looking at new business opportunities that are outside of our mainstram businesses Henry NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Stanley NRON cc Subject Methane Auto Hello Stan Couple of people called me to inquire about Enrons interest in investing in a methane car kit and filling infrastructure They wanted to submit an unsolicited proposal to Enron I indicated to the that I would first check to see if Enron would be interested in a venture of this type According to these two gentlemen the return on investment is very good ranging from Would Enron be interested in this type of business Regards Henry Embedded StdOleLink Embedded StdOleLink
